titles.title: To amend the Federal Law Enforcement Pay Reform Act of 1990 to provide that Federal police officers be treated in the same way as other Federal law enforcement officers for purposes of that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Law Enforcement Pay Reform Act of 1990 to provide that Federal GS-083 series police officers be treated as Federal law enforcement officers for purposes of such Act (which grants such officers a pay raise).
